callouts.name: Immersive Sound
callouts.description: A 960-watt, 22-speaker audio system with Road Noise Active Noise Cancellation provides an immersive listening experience and studio-quality sound.

callouts.name: Stay Connected
callouts.description: Instantly connect your devices with Bluetooth supporting multiple simultaneous connections, or quickly charge your devices by taking advantage of the 36W wireless and USB-C charging.

callouts.name: Elegant Style
callouts.description: Iconic lines combined with elegant modern proportions.

traveldesc: With an estimated range of up to 634 kilometers and access to the world's largest and most powerful fast-charging network, you'll spend less time charging and more time on the road.
